title: Call NOW to get $250 off move in!
posting_body: ['The Avantus Apartments', '8008 Montview Boulevard, Denver, CO, 80220', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 42', 'OR Text', '42', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Begin your adventure!', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 658 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'The Avantus is a contemporary collection of one and two-bedroom apartments for rent, situated just east of Denver’s core on Montview Boulevard.', 'For active professionals, The Avantus is in close proximity to Highway 225 and Highway 70 making Denver a place not just for work, but a playground for hiking, cycling, skiing, and countless other activities.', 'Explore the city’s natural surroundings in nearby parks and downtown attractions like walkable 16th Street, Larimer Square, the Denver Art Museum, or attend games at Coors Field and Ball Arena.', 'The community itself boasts a fitness center, clubhouse, and resort-style swimming pool to entertain and enjoy with family and friends.', 'With its accessible location and a neighborhood brimming with activity, the real Denver-ite can find a true home in The Avantus Apartments.', 'Don’t hesitate to discover all that awaits you at the best apartments in Denver, CO.', 'Begin your adventure!', 'Features', '- Dishwasher', '- Additional Storage', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Washer/Dryer*', '-
